Description: Beacon Place offer spacious 1 and 2 Bedroom Apartments for rental in Montgomery County in Gaithersburg. Located in the luxurious Kentlands our apartment homes feature well-equipped kitchens, mini-blinds, full-size washer and dryer, economical gas and heat, and private patio or balcony. You can workout in our fully equipped fitness center, relax by the pool, or take advantage of our elegant clubhouse. Come visit us today and make Beacon Place your New Home. In the heart of Montgomery County, Beacon Place is a reminder of the great urban neighborhoods that once made this country's cities so special. Here, in the 352-acre Kent Estate, is a planned mini-city where neighbors and merchants know each other by name. Beacon place is where the bricks and charm of a bygone era combine with the conveniences of today. Open house Saturday 9/19!

The good old days are available again, right in the heart of Gaithersburg. Surrounded by tree-lined streets, fountains and elegant park settings, these apartments look as if they were designed around 1900. Timeless and traditional. And that's just the outside. Inside there are amenities like 6' windows, 9' ceilings, gourmet kitchens and balconies. Choose from 17 distinctive one-, two- and three-bedroom apartment homes. At The Courts of Devon, our compliance with your standards is always in style.

Description: Londonderry in Gaithersburg, MD offer spacious 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments and 3 and 4 bedroom townhomes. We’re at the center of everything you need in Montgomery’s high tech corridor. 5 minutes to employers like NIST, NCR, HP, NHS, IBM & Lockheed Martin. 8 minutes to Adventist Health Care-Shady Grove Medical Center. Public transit is at your doorstep - Ride-On 54 & 59 stops here with service to Rockville Metro & Lakeforest Mall. 5 minutes to I-270, I-370 and the ICC/Rte. 200. 3-5 minutes to grocery stores and everyday shopping, as well as shopping, dining, and entertainment at RIO, Washingtonian Center and Downtown Crown. 10 minutes to Rockville Pike with thousands of stores, restaurants and services. 5 minutes to gyms, movies, parks and recreation. Apartment features include tons of storage space with big walk-in closets, a spacious living room with area for lots of furniture, most with relaxing covered balcony or patio, spacious kitchen, optional den or extra full bath, great natural light from large windows (we provide blinds throughout), and central heat and air conditioning. Utilities are not included in your rent – you pay for gas, electricity, and water/sewer. Cats are welcome. Property features include a huge outdoor swimming pool, heated indoor pool, fitness center with two racquetball courts, play and picnic areas throughout, two tennis courts, laundry and mail delivery in each building, directly located on paved hiker-biker trail connected to 20-mile trail network, on-site management office and 24-hour emergency maintenance. For more information and availability, visit www.londonderryapartments.net.

Overnight visitors must park in designated spaces.

Description: Great Location on Muddy Branch Road. Governor Square Apartments in Gaithersburg, MD offers huge 1, 2 and 3 bedrooms. We’re at the center of everything you need. Public transit is at your doorstep – Ride-On bus 54 stops here with service to Rockville Metro and Lakeforest Mall. 5 minutes to I-270, I-370 and the ICC/Rte. 200. 5 minutes to grocery stores, RIO, Washingtonian Center, Downtown Crown, Bohrer Water Park, Olde Towne Gaithersburg and many employers like NIST, NCR, IBM & Lockheed Martin. 5-10 minutes to endless grocery stores, shopping, restaurants, everyday services, gyms, parks and recreation. Apartment features include a large living area with space for lots of furniture, extra-large foyer with coat & storage closets, a separate dining area with room for a table and up to 6 chairs, a fully equipped galley-style kitchen, some with an extra flex area, natural light from large windows (we provide blinds throughout), views of green courtyards or mature forest, and central heat and air conditioning. Gas and most electricity utilities included in rent – you pay water/sewer. Cats are welcome. Property features include a telephone entry system, swimming pool with sundeck, 3 on-site play areas, mail delivery and laundry facility in each building, direct access to a 20-mile hiker-biker trail, on-site management office and 24-hour emergency maintenance services. For more information and availability, visit www.governorsquareapartments.com.

Enjoy our amenities which include a fitness center and a refreshing swimming pool. Our on-site management will meet your needs in a friendly, professional manner. Shopping is located nearby--we're across the street from Lakeforest Mall! Cider Mill is located only minutes from I-270 & Shady Grove Red Line Metro Station. Pets are welcome. Let Cider Mill be your new home! Housing Choice Vouchers Welcome. Se aceptan vales de eleccion de vivienda. A fixture in Montgomery Village for many years, Cider Mill Apartments offers numerous floor plans and a variety of community amenities. Available units are comprised of one, two and three bedrooms. All units come cable ready and with fully equipped kitchens, and some feature balconies or patios. Community amenities include an outdoor pool, a fitness room, playground, picnic area, car wash area, parking and several laundry rooms dispersed around the complex. Cats and dogs are welcome at an extra fee. Residents have easy access to bus lines, shopping, dining and day care.

Description:
Located in a quiet suburban neighborhood, Mill Creek offers you spacious apartments and beautiful scenic views from open balconies. Adjacent parkland provides recreational activities, including tennis and basketball facilities. Mill Creek is walking distance from Seneca Park and Lake Needwood. Located only minutes to the Shady Grove Metro station, I-270, and the newly constructed Inter-County-Connector (ICC), Mill Creek offers you convenient access to the I-95 corridor. Falls Grove and Rio shopping centers are only a few minutes away, and the restaurants and theaters of The Kentlands just five minutes further. Mill Creek is served by the Montgomery County school system, one of the finest in the United States.
Amenities
Mill Creek provides you with all the amenities that you are looking for: On site private swimming pool with separate wading pool
Extensive play area for children
Individually controlled heating and air conditioning
Spacious private balcony/patio
Options to Upgrade - Stainless Steel appliances, Washer/dryer in apt, Reserved Parking
Plush wall-to-wall carpeting
Professionally maintained laundry facilities in each building – individual LG washers/ dryer combo are available on request
Fully equipped kitchen with bay windows, dishwasher, disposal and adjacent eat-in-area
Walk-in closets
Cable and internet ready
Living and dining room area
24-hour maintenance

Description: Saybrooke Apartments is a 252-unit apartment community located in Gaithersburg, Maryland with one, two, and three bedroom apartments for rent. The community is located near the Shady Grove Metro Station and the Ride On bus stop #64 at the entrance of the community. Saybrooke's residents have easy access to Interstate 270 and the new InterCounty Connector MD Route 200 for a convenient commute to Baltimore and Washington DC. WIth a great location also comes an array of amenities such as a swimming pool with sundeck, free Wi-Fi in the clubhouse, and a 24-hour strength and cardio center. Apartment homes include full size washer and dryer, outside storage on the private patios or balconies, and wood burning fireplaces. Stop by or schedule an appointment to tour and lease your new apartment home today!

We are nestled in the historic Olde Towne Gaithersburg, surrounded by beautiful landscaping and specialty shops. The City of Gaithersburg occupies 10 square miles in the heart of Montgomery County, Maryland. The southeastern border of the City lies just 13 miles from the northwestern border of Washington, D.C., and 18.5 miles northwest of the U.S. Capitol Building. Description: Welcome to Spring Ridge Apartments, a beautiful garden style community designed for an easy-living life style and conveniently located for fabulous shopping, commuting and situated in a nearby countryside setting! Carefree living the way it should be. Spring Ridge Apartments offer modern apartment homes that give you old-fashioned space, quality and convenience. Whether you're heading for work or the scenic pleasures of the countryside, I-270 gets you there in a hurry. Or use the convenient Shady Grove Metro stop for a smooth, no-hassle ride to NIH, Bethesda and downtown Washington, D.C. Our one, two and three bedroom apartment homes feature large bedrooms and huge full access closets. In addition, this community offers affordable rents, newly renovated and fully equipped kitchens that come with a breakfast bar, gas cooking and wall-to-wall carpet, or custom refinished hard wood flooring, massive living and dining rooms, floor to ceiling windows to allow plenty of natural sunlight, a dishwasher, garbage disposal, frost free refrigerators, oversized patios and all utilities included except for electric! In the summer time, come and cool down in our Olympic size swimming pool. Great customer service and a management staff that truly cares! Come make Spring Ridge Apartments your new home. You will be glad that you did. Housing Choice Vouchers Welcome - Vales de Eleccion de Vivienda Bienvenidos

Description: Beautiful 1 bedroom condo nestled in the heart of the Kentlands. Walk to shops & restaurants. Five minute ride to Rio & Crown. Fifteen minutes to Pike and Rose. 1 assigned garaged parking space steps from condo. Hardwood floors in living/dining room. Features granite countertops and a fireplace. Walk in closet. Washer & Dryer in unit. Pool pass. Bar & Wine tasting room on site. Access to the gym. Balcony overlooks a quiet courtyard.

Description:
Beautiful end unit TH in urban Gaithersburg! Largest model in the community. Former model home with HW floor. 3-level bump out. 9' ceiling. Maple cabinets. Stainless steel appliances. Skylight. Master Bath Jacuzzi. 2-car garage. 3 fire places. Large deck. Walk to Rio Town Center and Downtown Crown with access to lake, restaurants, 2 gyms (LifeTime Athletic and LA Fitness), movie theater and more. Minutes to Shady Grove Metro Station. Great schools (Wooton HS cluster)!
For more photos:
http://www.mrishomes.com/rentals/16-GRACELAND-ST-GAITHERSBURG-MD-20878-216668646

Images: ![Primary Photo - 802 Amber Tree Ct](https://images1.apartments.com/i2/Hvohks8GdWSPSrGPYFDdYWWTXA8hCWNH76t1VTw4ZIA/110/802-amber-tree-ct-unit-301-gaithersburg-md-primary-photo.jpg) ![Building Photo - 802 Amber Tree Ct](https://images1.apartments.com/i2/Ok_ECUA3h1W9J81n65CJpPQWl_6MMGJ1H0FpLCZujKU/118/802-amber-tree-ct-unit-301-gaithersburg-md-building-photo.jpg) ![Building Photo - 802 Amber Tree Ct](https://images1.apartments.com/i2/BV4ces0bO6b5UCwsAHF0p5fgild8mrHtMKsPrhswers/118/802-amber-tree-ct-unit-301-gaithersburg-md-building-photo.jpg) ![Building Photo - 802 Amber Tree Ct](https://images1.apartments.com/i2/3Fi8GeeS4ffr3mjP1Uytm3IXZkpbTlVM4u9aUC0b3XM/118/802-amber-tree-ct-unit-301-gaithersburg-md-building-photo.jpg) ![Building Photo - 802 Amber Tree Ct](https://images1.apartments.com/i2/INCN2i4JAbOYIb7bJ1IFG5xda-vgLSeAFyEyUZNUQCM/118/802-amber-tree-ct-unit-301-gaithersburg-md-building-photo.jpg)
Description:
Beautiful, sunny, condo great community near RIO/Crown/Kentlands
Available Starting November 1st.
Beautiful, sunny, 2 bedrooms, 2 full and 1 half bath condo on the top third floor in a sought after community in an excellent location, close to Rio Center, The Crown, I-270 and Kentlands. Plenty of Parking. Located next to Medimmune Headquarters, Human Genome Sciences, Shady Grove Hospital and NIST. 7 Minutes to Shady Grove Metro Station - Red Line
Features:
- Two large bedrooms with private baths 
- Jacuzzi in the master bathroom
- Vaulted ceilings
- Real wood burning FP
- New HVAC
- New Heater
- Arched Foyer
- Huge screened in porch
- Separate laundry room with full-size washer & dryer 
- Separate dining area 
- Large walk-in closets 
- Pre-wired CAT-5 for high-speed internet access 
- Hardwood Floors
- Remodeled kitchen and master bath
- Walk to pool and tennis courts, and park with jogging trails.
- Tot lot for the children
- Utilities included: water, trash pick up, pool and tennis courts.
Interactive Neighborhood Website! 
http://washingtonianwoods.com/
Schools:
Elementary School - Fields Road Elementary
Middle School - Ridgeview Middle School
High School - Quince Orchard High School

Description:
This renovated 2nd level condo is move-in ready. Spend your evenings on your balcony overlooking green space. Enjoy your upgraded kitchen with stainless steel appliances & granite countertops. Unit features new windows & new balcony door, very new carpet and painting. Ceiling fans in dining & bedroom. Full size washer & dryer in large utility room. Great location close to Ride-On, Metro, I-270 and shopping. Reserved parking close to condo. 
No Smoking Maximum of 2 adults and 1 infant in unit Renters insurance required Pets considered on a case by case basement Rental fees are paid online

Description: This beautiful end-unit features a welcoming foyer; lovely kitchen w/ dine-in space; cozy living room w/ bay window; separate dining room w/ patio doors that lead to an expansive deck; lots of natural sunlight; ceilings fans in every bedroom; spacious finished walkout basement w/ rec space full bed/bath; spacious fenced-in backyard & 2 assigned parking spaces. Easy access to I-270, Metro & shops.

Description:
Apartment on Quince Orchard Blvd in Gaithersburg, MD, available now!
$1685/mo. - ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED (water, gas, electricity)
Please email/ call if interested!
The Apartment:
- 2 large bedrooms
- 2 full baths (1 full bath with private entrance from master bedroom)
- Dining room
- Large living room with floor to ceiling sliding doors that open to private balcony
- Fully equipped kitchen with gas range, brand new refrigerator, and dishwasher
- Plenty of storage in wall-length closets in both bedrooms and hallway
- Prewired for internet and cable 
- Reserved parking and guest parking available
- Community center and swimming pool access
The Location:
- Near Quince Orchard shopping center shops and restaurants
- Walking distance to several local parks and playgrounds
- Close to public transportation
- Minutes from NIST (National Institute of Standards and Technology) and MedImmune
- Near Kentlands Market Square

Description: Welcome to your new home, Amber Commons, in the heart of Gaithersburg. Mature landscape and trees surround you in our serene wooded community. Enjoy convenient community amenities including a Business Center, Fitness Center, Sparkling pool, Grills, Community Playground and 24-hour emergency maintenance. In your spacious home you will find a gorgeous fully-equipped kitchen including all new stainless steel appliances, crown molding, and walk in closets. Take advantage of metropolitan living with conveniences just around the corner and the comforts of a quiet place to call home. If you are looking for a home in the Gaithersburg area, visit us by scheduling an appointment today.

Description: Walker House is the community for you if you desire a peaceful setting, all while staying close by to major transportation routes. Neighboring I-270 and the Shady Grove Metro, Walker House offers both garden style and high-rise apartment homes. Residents enjoy the comfort and convenience of high-rise living, without sacrificing spacious apartments, open floor plans and countless outdoor amenities.

Description: From pristine landscaping and convenient location, to well-appointed interiors and a generous offering of first-rate amenities, there is a lot to love about The Gateway Apartments. Choose from one, two and three bedroom apartments with flowing layouts, washers and dryers, faux wood flooring, huge eat-in modern kitchens and brand new individual heating and cooling systems. You will find endless opportunities for fun and relaxation just steps from your front door. Plus, your family will be in the perfect Gaithersburg, MD location with 6 bus stops to the Shady Grove metro station into Washington D.C., 7 playgrounds, and the only community in the sought after Thurgood Marshall School district. Whether you're catching some rays on the expansive sundeck, taking a refreshing dip in the sparkling swimming pool, working up a sweat in our HarborFit 24-hour fitness center, or running your dog in one of 2 bark parks you'll find The Gateway Apartments is the perfect place to live, unwind and play e

Description: Are you looking for Comfort, Convenience, and Value? It's all here at The Rothbury Apartments! Regal 1, 2, and 3 bedroom apartment homes with incredible amenities and finishes. The convenience of a 24-hour fitness facility, full-size washer and dryer, a walk to the Goshen Crossing Shopping Centre, and ease of access to the Shady Grove Metro or ICC. The comfort of apartments with deep soaking tubs, gourmet kitchens with tile flooring, and spacious walk-in closets. The value of outstanding customer service and attentive on-site maintenance.

Description: Make yourself at homeWe don't just rent apartments. From the moment you walk through the front door you'll feel the comfort and security that makes our residents happy to call us home. Cutting edge amenities, meticulously-groomed grounds, and a dedicated staff contributes to a higher standard of living. Convenient shopping, award-winning schools, local museums and parks are all close at hand, with sponsored activities to develop new hobbies while getting to know your neighbors.

Description:
(301) 652-7077 - Studio/1Bath @ Montgomery House Apts. Community Garden Onsite & Close to Public Transit - Studio/One bath apartment @ Montgomery House Apartments in Gaithersburg, MD. We are located on Rte 355 between Shady Grove Rd and historic Gaithersburg across from Gaithersburg HS. Also close to other Montgomery County Schools, Ride On, & Shady Grove Metro. 
This apartment will feature hardwood floors and fresh paint. Rent includes gas & water. Building has laundry facility on site, free parking, and (when its warmer!) a community garden. Security doors to enter buildings. Property is kept clean by professional management daily. Sorry, no pets.
Application required, plus $1,000 refundable security deposit & $40 per/adult application fee. Open M-F, 9-5. Call Landmark Realty Inc. 301-652-7077 or visit www.Bindeman.com. Se habla espanol.
No Pets Allowed
(RLNE2716320) Other Amenities - Parking, Other- studio, community garden. Pet policies - No Dogs Allowed, No Cats Allowed.

Description:
(443) 758-1005 - 2BR/2BA Updated Terrace Level Condo! - Great Commute to DC and Bethesda! - Updated 2 bedroom and 2 full bath terrace level condo with great commute to DC and Bethesda! Features include gorgeous hardwood flooring throughout a spacious living room with wood fireplace, separate dining room and den/sunroom that would make a great home office. Fully equipped/updated kitchen has tiled floors, custom tiled backsplash and all stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and gas stove. Separate laundry/storage area with washer/dryer included. Full hall bath with tiled tub enclosure leads to 2 large bedrooms, including a master suite with walk in closet and full master bath. Enjoy the outdoors on a cozy patio that is great for entertaining. Neighborhood has community pool and park that are free for tenants to access. Very close to Boher Park in Gaithersburg and great shopping/restaurants options nearby!
No Pets Allowed
(RLNE3602120) Other Amenities - Other- hardwood floors, fully equipped kitchen, custom tiled floors, custom tiled backsplash, stainless steel appliances, fireplace, sunroom, walk in closet, playground, Pool, Patio. Appliances - Range, Washer & Dryer. Pet policies - No Dogs Allowed, No Cats Allowed.

Description: Beautiful colonial on a cul-de-sac backing to common park area & walking trail. Double wide driveway for ample parking. Easy living floor plan w/open concept kitchen flowing to family room leading to a large deck & flat fenced yard. Large master suite w/walk-in closet & full bath. New carpet new water heater. Minutes to 270 & 200 close to Shady Grove metro bus shopping and dining.

Kitchen:
* Dishwasher
* Eat-in Kitchen
* Oven
* Range
* Refrigerator

Description: CONTACT ALT. AGENT WITH ALL QUESTIONS. FRESHLY REMODELED END UNIT TOWNHOUSE. 3 BEDROOM 2 1/2 BATHROOMS. FENCED IN BACK YARD WITH STORAGE SHED. SHORT STROLL TO PARK LAND WITH PLAYGROUND BASKETBALL TENNIS BASEBALL FIELD AND PICNIC AREAS. PETS ACCEPTED ON CASE BY CASE. 40 APP FEE PER ADULT. CREDIT SCORE 600 NO ITEMS IN COLLECTION NO PREVIOUS EVICTIONS PROOF OF INCOME REQUIRED. ACCEPTS VOUCH

* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Ice Maker
* Eat-in Kitchen
* Microwave
* Oven
* Refrigerator

One Assigned Parking with Plenty of Unassigned Parking.Quiet Neighborhood.

Full size washer and dryer in unit. Water is included in the rental. Remodeled bathroom. Walk to shopping grocery etc. Great commuter route. Only cats allowed for pets. No smoking allowed. Good credit a must.

Description:
(301) 339-8850 - Spacious and updated 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom townhouse. 1-car garage - Beautiful and very spacious 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom townhouse with a 1-car garage. Easy access to 270 and close to all amenities. This home has a completely re-done kitchen that opens to a welcoming eating area, a large living room with a wood-burning fireplace set on a stone wall, next to sliding doors to a wooden deck that backs onto open space. The master bedroom is very large with cathedral ceilings, and lots of closet space, including a walk-in closet. Two other bedrooms share a full bathroom in the same floor. The lower floor features a newly finished very large rec room/family room to add even more space to this professionally managed property. Community amenities include basketball courts, common grounds, Outdoor pool and tennis courts.
Pets ok on a case by case basis.
(RLNE3595404) Other Amenities - Other- updated kitchen, new family room, fireplace, central ac/heating, storage, ceiling fans, close to amenities, Garage, Deck. Appliances - Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Range, Washer & Dryer.

Description:
(970) 331-4037 - 3BR/3BA Townhouse in Gaithersburg with Solar Panels! Great Commute to DC! - Lovely 3BR/3BA townhouse located in Gaithersburg with great commute to DC! This property has it's own solar panel system!! First level features tiled and hardwood flooring throughout a spacious living room and a fully equipped kitchen/dining room combo with plenty of cabinet storage space. The second floor has a full hall bath with tiled floors and tiled jetted soaker tub as well as 3 spacious bedrooms. Master bedroom leads to full master bath with tiled floors and tiled walk in shower. Fully finished basement clubroom has full bath and separate laundry/storage room with washer/dryer included. Enjoy a fully fenced backyard great for entertaining with detached storage shed for tenant use!
Pets considered on a case by case basis under 30lbs with additional pet deposit.
Contact David at (970) 331-4037 for details or to schedule an appointment or email djannati@baymgmtgroup.com
You can apply for this unit or get more information at our website http://www.baymgmtgroup.com/laurel-md-rental-listings/laurel-single-family/

(RLNE3570063) Other Amenities - Other- solar panels, hardwood floors, custom tiled floors, fully equipped kitchen, jetted soaker tub, basement clubroom, detached storage shed, Yard. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed.

Description:
(443) 758-1005 - Beautifully Updated 2BR/1Bath Condo in Gaithersburg, MD! - Gorgeous 2 bedroom and 1 bathroom condo in Montgomery County conveniently located to Rt. 200 (ICC), I270, I370, and metro lines. Tenants can enjoy many shopping and restaurant options nearby as well as great schools and close proximity to hospital. This fully renovated 2nd floor condo features a cozy living room/dining room combo with beautiful crown molding throughout and an updated kitchen with new countertops, tray ceiling and gorgeous laminate hardwood flooring. Two spacious bedrooms with plenty of closet space, including a master bedroom with mirrored closet and access to a private balcony overlooking a wooded area. Hardwood flooring continues into a fully updated bathroom with new fixtures and a separate laundry area with plenty of storage space and like-new LG washer/dryer. The community has many recreational options, to include a pond and walking trail and playground area.
Cats (no more than 1) considered with additional $500 deposit (No dogs, please).
Contact Sophia at (443) 758-1005 for details or to schedule an appointment or email scolon@baymgmtgroup.com
You can apply for this unit or get more information at our website http://www.baymgmtgroup.com/laurel-md-rental-listings/laurel-single-family/
Good Credit Score required. Any slightly lower scores will be considered on a case by case basis.
No Dogs Allowed

Description:
(240) 988-8008 - Beautifully Renovated 3 Bed, 3 1/2 Bath Townhome in Montgomery Village! - Please email Noah Trager at Noah@StreamlineManagement.com with any questions, or to set up a time to see this fantastic property.
This is the one! Stunning renovation from top to bottom! This home boasts 3 1/2 brand new bathrooms, complete with ceramic tile and mosaic inlays. New floors, carpet, kitchen cabinets, granite, the list goes on...
On the main floor you'll find a powder room, and a nice sized living room with a open floor plan leading into the brand new kitchen. Off the kitchen is a great deck to enjoy a cup of coffee. Travel upstairs to find 2 bedrooms (plus a big loft) and 2 brand new bathrooms.
Travel down to the lower level where you'll find another renovated full bathroom, and a family room and/or bedroom. Best of all, this room leads out to your own private patio.
Enjoy all the amenities of Mont. Village with an easy commute to DC, via 270 or Metro, close to shopping, playgrounds, and pools.
Lease Terms:
* $40 application fee required
* 1 months security deposit required
* Min 12 month lease
* No smoking is permitted inside the property
* Tenant responsible for all utilities
* Pets are considered on case by case basis
(RLNE3525224) Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed.

Description:
(443) 261-4915 - AVAILABLE NOW! Unit Size: 700 sq. ft. Lease Length: 1 year, or longer Space: 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment on basement level Base rent: $1,100 base, plus $50/person in utilities MAXIMUM OCCUPANCY 2 PEOPLE -- NO EXCEPTIONS! About you: - Non-smoker, no drugs - Pays on time - Easy to live with - Clean and tidy - Currently employed (employment verification required) - Credit check - Personal/business references available - No pets About the unit: - Furnished one bedroom basement apartment, with closet in bedroom - Private kitchen - Private shower bathroom - One month security deposit required - One year lease required, or longer Amenities / Utilities included: - Full size washer and dryer in unit (shared) - One reserved parking space - Utility payment includes: electric, water/sewage Furnishings: - Bedroom -- Full size bed with frame with new mattress, dresser, mirror - Bathroom -- Shelves for storage - Living room / kitchen area -- Small sleeper sofa, coffee table, two-person cafe table, small book shelf, TV stand - Kitchen -- Sink, designer dishes, pots/pans, utensils, microwave, stove with oven, hood, and new fridge What's close by? - Trader Joe's / Grocery stores -- 6 minutes / 3 minutes - I-270 -- 10 minute drive - ICC MD-200 E -- 10 minute drive - Shady Grove Metro station / Red line -- 12 minute drive - RideOn Bus to Shady Grove Metro station -- 30 second walk; 16 minute ride - Walk path / bike path / soccer fields / playground -- 2 minute walk - Lake Whetstone with path around lake -- 7 minute walk
(RLNE3507992) Other Amenities - Parking, Basement. Appliances - Dishwasher, Air Conditioning, Refrigerator, Range, Garbage Disposal, Washer & Dryer, Microwave. Lease lengths - 12 Months, 24 Months.

Description:
(240) 988-8008 - Premium 5Bed/3.5Bath Colonial walking distance to the Kentlands! - Perfect Home in a even better Location! This is one of the largest models in sought after QO Park.
Walk to the Kentlands, MedImmune and Astra Zeneca and minutes from Crown, Rio & 270. This home features a sun drenched kitchen w/new granite counters, island, stainless steel appliances & butlers' pantry. Enjoy a cup of coffee in your airy morning room off the kitchen with huge Palladian windows. 
Travel upstairs to the Master bedroom, complete with walk in closet & master bath suite. To round is all out, there's a spacious, fully finished, walkout basement w/ bedroom and full bath.
Contact Noah Trager at Noah@streamlinemanagement.com to view this amazing home today.
Lease Terms:
12 month minimum lease
Small pets considered case by case
No smoking
Tenant is responsible for all utilities
To Apply:
Please go to www.streamlinemanagment.com, click on available properties, click on the apply now button next to this listing. Please fill out all information and upload supporting documents. $40 application fee per adult applicant.
(RLNE3377279) Other Amenities - Other- children's play areas, Pool. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed.

Description:
(301) 339-8850 - Spacious upgraded 2BR/2BA condo. All utilities included - Newly renovated large 2 bedroom 2 full bathroom condo. Large living room with walkout to balcony. Separate dining room as well as separate breakfast room off the kitchen. This condo has two large bedrooms with the master bedroom featuring walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom. Full size washer and dryer in unit as well as plenty of storage space. Unit has all new carpets, window coverings and paint throughout. This is a top floor unit so it is nice and quiet. 
Close to MARC train and 3 miles to Metro. Recreational facilities in the Villa Ridge Condominium include tot lots, tennis courts, basketball courts, picnic area, volleyball court, community room and swimming pool complex.
Property is professionally managed.
(RLNE2242176) Other Amenities - Other- new paint, new carpets, central ac/heating, walk-in closet, en-suite master bathroom, separate dining room, all utilites included, Pool, Balcony. Appliances - Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Range, Garbage Disposal, Washer & Dryer.

Description:
(301) 563-9021 x101 - Spacious One Bedroom Apartment Home - Enter the beautiful surroundings of mature trees and manicured lawns at Brookside View. Your spacious home has been fully renovated and includes a washer and dryer. Your modern kitchen has beautifully coordinated appliances and counter-tops, and a multitude of cabinets. The cabinets and counter-tops even continue into the dining area in your built in bar. You will also enjoy the abundance of closet space. 
Office hours are Monday and Wednesday from 9am-5pm and Friday from 9am-12pm. We encourage you to make an appointment for a tour of a beautiful apartment home with one of our leasing professionals. Call or text (301) 563-9021 x102 or email at brookside@oculusrealty.com.
(RLNE1844933) Other Amenities - Other- parking lot, park views, picnic area, playground, storage closet, Pool, Exercise Facility, Garage. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed.

Description:
---- SCHEDULE A SHOWING ONLINE AT: http://showmojo.com/lac/e87d016072 ----
Elegant 4 story, 2 car garage townhome, in one of the most desirable areas in Gaithersburg, Maryland. This end unit in the Hidden Creek community is now available for rent. This home features an upgraded kitchen with gorgeous granite counter tops and dual wall ovens, a cook's dream! Large Master Suite w/ the master bathroom that was upgraded and exudes a spa atmosphere; truly a perfect place to retreat after a long day. 4 spacious bedrooms,3 1/2 baths, plus an entry level office, hardwood flooring throughout and a 2 car garage, a must see!

Description: Maplewood Villas are located within walking distance of Old Town Gaithersburg. Beautifully appointed courtyards separate the attractive brick two-story buildings with subdued decorative elements, including arched doorways. The garden style apartment homes and large 2 & 3 bedroom townhomes are conveniently located for suburban shopping, commuting. Our apartment homes and townhomes feature large bedrooms with ample closet space, wall-to-wall carpet, or custom refinished hard wood floors, enormous living rooms and floor to ceiling windows for extra natural sunlight. Maplewood Villas offer upscale living at affordable prices, all packaged in a fantastic location and wrapped in gorgeous surroundings. A large parking lot is available for residents, as is reserved parking. We are conveniently located near I-270 and Route 355 with bus access to the Shady Grove Metro Station which can easily get you to NIH, Bethesda and downtown Washington DC. We are a short commute to NIST, the Universities at Shady Grove and Montgomery County’s Biotechnology Corridor. Great customer service and a management staff that really cares! Come make Maplewood Villas your new home.

Description:
Located just off North Frederick Avenue in Gaithersburg, this small community is a hidden gem. Generous floorplans include beautiful, newly updated kitchens, ample closets, carpet and hardwood flooring (in select apartments). Every apartment home has complementary window treatments and each apartment home is located within steps of a laundry facility.
Residents have use of a Community Garden, Playground and Picnic Area with grills. The apartments are all located within resident controlled access buildings and parking is by permit only. The North Frederick Avenue location places dining, shopping and entertainment all within easy reach and, for convenience, there is access to public transportation.

Description: At Washington Square, you’ll find a Gaithersburg townhome that is designed for those who seek a quality home that meets and exceeds their expectations. This community has everything that you want in a new home: carefully selected amenities for your enjoyment, a location in the neighborhood you desire and modern features that are centered on comfort and style. Whether you choose a two, three or four bedroom townhome, you’ll find a modern, newly renovated design and spacious closets that make coming home something special. In addition to these wonderful comforts, you’ll also enjoy all of the extras at Washington Square such as our clubhouse, playground and onsite parking! Need to surf the web? Not a problem, because wifi in your room is free! With our close proximity to 270 and the MARC train, everything is in your reach. Call today and schedule a tour to find your perfect floor plan.

We offer spacious one bedroom, two bedroom, and three bedroom apartments that have been fully renovated. When it is time to venture out, you will appreciate the great location in Gaithersburg, just minutes from the ICC, the Shady Grove Metro Station and we even have a bus stop on-site. Commuting will be a breeze! Call today to arrange a tour of your new home!

Description: If you live life at a fast pace, your home base needs a central location - close to major thoroughfares and work, yet near all the places you can enjoy in your downtime. Parklane is that place. You can walk to nearby schools, shopping, public transportation, and Upper County Community Center with its basketball courts and pools. Quick access to Highways 370, 270 and 355 puts you within minutes of a wide venue of shopping and entertainment. Besides a great location, Parklane offers a quiet, park-like atmosphere to retreat, spend some solitude and be refreshed. Newly refurbished two and three-bedroom apartments and three and four-bedroom townhomes are equipped with details to make life easy: fully equipped kitchens, lots of closet space, expansive windows and private patios. Plus, Parklane offers affordable housing apartment homes (income limits apply.) All homes are designed to make your life a little easier - and allow you to spend more time on things that are important to you. CALL FOR DETAILS.
